properties.question: When prescribing orthoses, which factor is most critical to consider for ensuring proper fit and function?
properties.option_a: The patient's favorite color for the orthosis
properties.option_b: The brand popularity of the orthosis
properties.option_c: The patient's body measurements and specific needs
properties.option_d: The time of year the orthosis is prescribed
